query:
SELECT qp.topicId, qp.questionId, qp.firstAttemptStatus, qp.lastAttemptStatus, qp.attempts, t.title as topic_title
FROM question_progress qp
JOIN topics t ON qp.topicId = t.id
WHERE qp.userId = 7 AND t.courseId = 30002
ORDER BY qp.topicId, qp.questionId;
